title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson kiss in bed wearing Joker filter masks
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson are making sure they are ready for Halloween, as the two locked lips while dressing up as The Joker.

Cody took to his Instagram stories to share footage of him and Miley lying in bed in their underwear, as the two can be seen wearing mask filters in the style of the iconic DC Comics Character, whose latest movie, starring Joaquin Phoenix, was recently released to cinemas.

As the two can be seen smiling and glaring at the camera in their Instagram filter getup, the two later proceeded to share a French kiss before the video comes to an end.

The couple only began dating a few weeks ago, but they are already making the most of their relationship.

They were spotted grabbing coffee together on 13 October, while they also previously shared some loved-up looking snaps to Cody’s Instagram story.

The Australian singer previously revealed that he is ‘happy’ with his new beau, and that their relationship did not happen suddenly due to their previous friendship.

‘I’m very happy. We are very, very happy,’ he told People.

‘She’s creative. She’s very passionate about what she does, and I’m very similar in that sense. That’s why we get along so well.’

Miley has been dating Cody following from her split to Kaitlynn Carter (Picture: Instagram)

‘The reason why it hasn’t been a really crazy sudden thing is just because we’ve been friends for so long.

‘Any girlfriends I’ve had in the past has always been immediate romance and so it’s a different experience having been friends with somebody before and it developing naturally into something more.’

Miley began dating Cody following her split from Kaitlynn Carter, with the two embarking on a summer romance.

Prior to Kaitlynn, the 26-year-old was married to fellow Aussie Liam Hemsworth, with the former couple announcing their divorce in August 2018.

Since their split, Liam has been pictured packing on the PDA with Dynasty star Maddison Brown, as the two were seen enjoying a night out with friends in New York City.
